ohu sithuwe yuddhaya karana nisa ha yuddhaya dinu nisa rate palana balaya athulu hama depalakma thamantath, thamange samipathamayantath risi deyak karagannata mahajanathawa wisin pawara diya yuthu bawayi. 2015 janawariye balayen pahakarana thuru ohu kaleda, bari welawath parajaya nowuna nam dahadolos gunayak wadiyen ohu karanneda rata thamange budalayak lesa sitha melesa katayuthu kirimayi.

eksath jathinge manawa himikam kawunsalaye di shri lankawata purna sahaya labadena bawata wiyatnamaya prathignya deyi.idiri wasara deka wenuwen wiyatnamaya eksath jathinge manawa himikam kawunsalaye samajikathwaya himi karagena atha.eksath jathinge manawa himikam kawunsalaye samajikathwaya laba ganima wenuwen shri lankawen lada sahayogaya agaya karana bawa wiyatnama janadhipathi trong tan sang mahatha prakasha karayi.elambaena marthu masayedi switsarlanthaye jiniwahidi pawathwena eksath jathinge manawa himikam kawunsalayedi shri lankawata erehiwa yojanawak idiripath kirimata amerika eksath janapadaya athulu ratawal kihipayak uthsahayaka niratha wi sitina athara ewannak idiripath wanne nam eeta erehiwa shri lankawata sahaya labadena bawada wiyatnayamaya prakasha karayi.chinaya, wiyatnamaya athulu ratawal kihipayak eksath jathinge manawa himikam kawunsalayedi shri lankawata sahayadimata sudanamin sitithi.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage wishesha niyojithayaku lesa jyeshta amathi diw gunasekara mahatha wiyatnaye nila sancharayaka niratha wu athara ema sancharaya atharathura wiyatnama janadhipathi trong tan sang saha komiyunist paksha mahalekam naguyen fu trong mahathwarun samanga sakachcha kara thibe.shri lankawe wathman pragathiya menma manawa himikam sambandhayen laba thibena diyunuwa pilibandawa dirgha washayen karunu dakwa thibena athara ee sambandhayen wiyatnamaya dakwana sahayongaya agaya karana bawa sandahankara atha.
